steps.event_signature: dialogue|Narrator|It was a bright morning at the academy. The cherry blossoms were in full bloom.
dialogue|???|Hey! Are you the new transfer student?
dialogue|Sakura|I'm Sakura! Nice to meet you. Let me show you around!
